hjb.misc
Class MessagingTimeoutConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  hjb.misc.MessagingTimeoutConfiguration
public class MessagingTimeoutConfiguration
extends Object

MessagingTimeoutConfiguration is used to specify the maximum and default timeouts for waiting to receive JMS messages in HJB.

It specifies

  • a maximum timeout, which is used to limit HJB request-specified timeouts, because HJB does not allow requests to wait indefinitely.
  • a minimum timeout, used to stop a timeout of 0 being assigned (this corresponds to waiting indefinitely). The configured minimum timeout also serves as the default timeout value - it is used if no timeout value is specified.

Author:
Tim Emiola

Field Detail

MAXIMUM_TIMEOUT_PROPERTY

public static final String MAXIMUM_TIMEOUT_PROPERTY
System property name that can be used to change the maximum timeout on waiting to receive a JMS Message throughout HJB (in seconds).

The value of this constant is 'hjb.runtime.maximum-receive-timeout'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MINIMUM_TIMEOUT_PROPERTY

public static final String MINIMUM_TIMEOUT_PROPERTY
System property name that can be used to change for the timeout on waiting to receive a JMS message throughout HJB (in seconds).

The value of this constant is 'hjb.runtime.minimum-receive-timeout'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_TIMEOUT

public static final int DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_TIMEOUT
Constant that holds the default value for the maximum timeout on waiting to receive a JMS Message throughout HJB (in seconds). This value is the ceiling for timeout's specified in 'receive from consumer/subscriber' requests.

The value of this constant is 300 (i.e, 5 minutes).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MINIMUM_TIMEOUT

public static final int MINIMUM_TIMEOUT
Constant that holds the default value for the timeout on waiting to receive a JMS message throughout HJB (in seconds). This value is used when no timeout is specified in 'receive from consumer/subscriber' requests, as HJB does not allow indefinite waiting.

The value of this constant is 60 (i.e, 1 minutes).

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

MessagingTimeoutConfiguration

public MessagingTimeoutConfiguration()
Method Detail

getMinimumMessageTimeout

public int getMinimumMessageTimeout()
Returns the default message timeout. It defaults to MINIMUM_TIMEOUT, but if MINIMUM_TIMEOUT_PROPERTY is set and its value is valid, it uses that.

Returns:
the default message timeout.

getMaximumMessageTimeout

public int getMaximumMessageTimeout()
Returns the maximum message timeout. It defaults to DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_TIMEOUT, but if MAXIMUM_TIMEOUT_PROPERTY is set and its value is valid, it uses that.

Returns:
the maximum message timeout.
